revised_title: Exploring the Physical and Chemical Aspects of Muscle Contraction and Relaxation
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Muscle Physiology
tldr: The authors discuss the physical and chemical aspects of muscle contraction and relaxation, focusing on impedance changes, pH changes, and protein changes during these processes. They explore the role of muscle proteins and their complexes, as well as the influence of muscle length on pH changes. Their findings contribute to a better understanding of the underlying mechanisms of muscle contraction and relaxation.
